## Feature Description
Clearly describe the feature you’d like to see.

## Problem It Solves
Explain the user problem or need this addresses.

## Proposed Solution
Describe how it should work and any important details.

## Alternatives Considered
Mention other approaches you evaluated.

## Additional Context
Attach mockups, examples, or links if helpful.

Thanks for the suggestion — we value every idea.
